query:
SELECT EXISTS(
                SELECT 1 
                FROM 
                    http_trigger 
                WHERE 
                    CASE WHEN workspaced_route IS TRUE THEN
                        workspace_id || '/' || route_path_key = $1
                    ELSE
                        route_path_key = $1
                    END 
                    AND http_method = $2 
                    AND ($3::TEXT IS NULL OR path != $3)
            )
